name: Octov
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 34 - Theme: Two button controls - Vote here

Trap by greed, the little Octov will have to use a Golem to escape.

Controls:
Use only the Right and Left arrows to talk to your golem and get out of here alive.

Credits:

  • Antoine Semblat (Twitter / Patreon): Game designer, developper
  • Gautier Di Fusco: 2D artist
  • Ben Supertramp & Gab Maledict: Soundtrack and Soundesign
  • Aubry Grieger: Game & Level Design
